questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: 1 million euros is a lot of money. First of all, I would put it at the bank to allow me a little time to know what to do.

My priority would be: paying a nice house well located with 4 rooms and a car of my dream; the latest Toyota Yaris full option.Ten, I would help financially my family in Africa. For my mother, I would buy her a big house.
For my childrens,I would fill thier account in order to prepare thier future.
1 million euros is also a blessing, so I wouldn't forget the lest privileges. I would help humanitaries associations by providing money, clothes, food ...
If after this, I still have enough money, I would enjoy with my friends by travelling , shopping.
